item.title: Python and RSA
item.description: There are many Python toolkits for crypto, so I hope I’ve done the best choice (at least for now). This is a simple utility class for managing RSA keys, a sort of wrappera to the m2crypto class. import M2Crypto class RSA (object): def \_\_init\_\_ (self, bits=1024, padding=M2Crypto.RSA.pkcs1\_padding, exp=65537): self.bits = bits self.padding = padding self.exp = exp self.rsa = None def generate (self): self.rsa = M2Crypto.RSA.gen\_key( self.bits, self.exp, lambda x: None) def encrypt (self, s): c = "" bytes = self.
